price: 64. Hierna keerden jullie je ervan af. Als Allah jullie geen gunst en genade verleend had, dan zouden jullie zeker onder de verliezers zijn.
arabic: ثُمَّ تَوَلَّيۡتُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَۖ فَلَوۡلَا فَضۡلُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَرَحۡمَتُهُۥ لَكُنتُم مِّنَ ٱلۡخَٰسِرِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: thumma tawallaytum min baʿdi dhālika falawlā faḍlu al-lahi ʿalaykum waraḥmatuhu lakuntum mina al-khāsirīna
